thread.title: Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures
thread.title_full: Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures

title: Heat's Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures
text:
Heat guard Gerald Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First Posted: October 23, 2015 - 6:06 pmLast Updated: October 23, 2015 - 6:06 pm We also have more stories about: (click the phrases to see a list) 
Organizations: 
Men's sports (2326) 

NEW YORK â€” Miami Heat guard Gerald Green was fined $25,000 by the NBA on Friday for making menacing gestures in an exhibition game. 
The incidents occurred with 5:33 and 5:12 left in Miami's 110-105 victory over Washington on Wednesday night. Green scored 28 points in the game.
